description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. The Exterminator is an action packed game loaded with unlockable content. Featuring a variety of bug's from bee's to flies, each with there own special power. Your goal as an exterminator is to make and get the most money and skill possible. Patch 2.0
description.short: The Exterminator is an action packed game loaded with unlockable content. Featuring a variety of bug's from bee's to flies, each with there own special power. Your goal as an exterminator is to make and get the most money and skill possible. Patch 2.0
